name: Luut
description:
Made in 168 hours for 7DRL (: 

A tiny roguelite game. Fight your way through randomised dungeons, collect  gold, and try not to die.

Play now 🦇 (works great on mobile!)

Use the arrow keys or hjkl to walk around (or swipe on mobile). Monsters move when you move, each following a slightly different pattern (mostly picking a direction at random, but skeletons are more inclined to move towards you).
